thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Customer Ken T.
thread.title_full: MyComicShop reviewed by Customer Ken T.

author: Customer Ken T.
title: Customer Ken T.
text: My Comic Shop has never disappointed me. And extensive site with loads of info, even on books not in Stock. Accurate grading, large inventory of back issues and easy to use want list. Many esoteric issues, daily list of new in Stock books and an awesome auction. And probably the best phone available staff (yep, they answer the phone). Thanks Este for all your help!
